llm.feedback:
Up | 3–6 months | Deepen first-principles link from AI productivity to marginal value of information goods by anchoring uplift to Gemini uptake/upgrade-cycle cadence (5S9GJV2O3) and governance-friction dynamics (UVEQ2SJ0W) | Watch the pace of Gemini feature adoption and hardware refresh momentum and DAY/BKH disclosures crossing material thresholds to quantify capex/value uplift | 42%
Down | 0–3 weeks | Ground risk-off in tariff/geopolitics with defined triggers and invalidations | Watch tariff cadence, exemptions rulings, and court blocks (47020006) plus cross-border signals (K8PPBLI93) to gauge inflation/policy risk and credit-spread response | 35%
Up | 6–12 months | Durable AI productivity impulse and contained governance risk supporting tech-equity re-rating | Watch sustained Gemini-cycle updates and a credible DAY/BKH-outcome path that preserves software/device margins and compresses risk premia (5S9GJV2O3)(UVEQ2SJ0W) | 40%
Down | 6–12 months | Regime risk intensifies from episodic security shocks and large-deal frictions raising risk premia | Watch ongoing security incidents and policy chokepoints (ISXY49HGS)(UVEQ2SJ0W) plus tariff momentum/cross-border deterioration that worsens funding conditions | 25%
